name: Saka Tsuku Tokudaigou 2: J. League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!
overview: Saka Tsuku Tokudaigou 2: J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! (サカつく特大号２ Ｊ．ＬＥＡＧＵＥプロサッカークラブをつくろう！) is a Sega Dreamcast entry in the Let's Make series and a sequel to Saka Tsuku Tokudaigou: J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!.
